title: What is good in the jungle this season?
body: With the season 6 changes a lot of my champions for jungle don't really seem to be working as well as they used to. So I was wondering what you guys think is good right now.

replies.body: ty men am tri dis bueld an get pinterkril ty ty thx thx
There wasn't any changes in the jungle this season though... Like, it was made easier, new neutral objective, new jungle item... Everyone who used to work should still work....

That's what everyone keeps saying, I must be doing something wrong, but I swear I'm finishing clears with less health. Here's a few of my mains that are significantly worse:

Ekko{{champion:245}}: Was such a cool early game jungler for comps with too much AD, now with the removal of Purple Smite he's significantly worse. He needed that item for faster clears and sustain.

Amumu {{champion:32}}: In season 5 being in combat with a jungle monster gave a health and mana regeneration buff. This sometimes would even allow Amumu to give blue buff to mid. Not an option anymore, you're basically forced to start Blue, and the hunters talisman mana regeneration buff does nothing.

Jarvan {{champion:59}}: I didn't play this guy since season 4, but when I saw we were in a snowball meta I thought I'd pick him up again. OMG does he take the D in the jungle. I thought he was early game champion, but that first clear is terrible.

Those are some stand-out cases. I'm just finding I'm always a pot short on clears, especially with Refillable Potion.

Wait purple smite gone? I don't remember reading about that lol

Wait really Talisman doesn't help Mumu?

Man I play J4 all the time I haven't had any problems.

What runes and masteries are you running on your Junglers? I could help you out there since I watched Phreak stream a tutorial about it

Make sure you take all the Jungle masteries man! Literally all my Jungle pages have an 18 slot and then 6 in the other two slots because there are valuable jungle masteries there.

Make sure you take flat armour yellows on EVERYONE and magic pen will do you no good for AP Junglers since monsters don't have MR so AS or HybridPen reds are the way to go
I'll try it out. Thanks for the advice guys :D
At the time of this comment? tryndamere with that crit mastery is up there
I tried it. That's going to be nerfed soon LOL. Surely there is no way Riot will let this pass.
Yeah it's already getting talked about in the PBE
